item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello everyone, On this page you will find all relevant information about me. For more detailed information, I invite you to visit my Linkedin I’m currently a research and development engineer at DataThings in Luxembourg. I received an Engineering degree in Computer Science with a major in Information Security from Polytechâ€™Nice Sophia in 2014. I got my PhD in October 2018 at the University of Luxembourg defending a thesis on the Evaluation of Vulnerability Prediction Models.
